sections.title: Typical workflow
sections.intro: Configure Transcribe Local Video with the connection fields and run it as part of a BrainBoost pipeline.

cards.title: Connect
cards.text: Provide videos_dir, context_dir, whisper_model_size, specific_video_path in the connection form.

cards.title: Fetch
cards.text: Run `fetch()` to ingest, transform, or stream data.

cards.title: Consume
cards.text: Use the emitted items in downstream indexing, search, or automation steps.

items.q: What do I need to configure?
items.a: At minimum: videos_dir, context_dir, whisper_model_size, specific_video_path. Additional fields may be optional depending on your use case.
Writes BrainBoost context artifacts and emits structured items downstream.
Outputs are emitted to downstream subscribers in the BrainBoost pipeline. Some datasources also write artifacts (context files, catalogs, or exports) locally based on your configuration.

sections.title: Ready to use Transcribe Local Video?
sections.text: Add it to your BrainBoost pipeline and start ingesting.
